MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 10:10AM in the SY14 postcode area of Malpas following reports of a low overhead line conductor. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:12AM on 4th February 2021
